content: note - this pattern is free on the blog but an ad-free pdf is also available in the ravelry shop for $5 this pattern is for creating a spider web poncho plus a spider for adornment difficulty - beginner/advanced beginner finished size adult one size stitch guide chain s chain s st s stitch es skip skip a stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half double crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet dtr treble_crochet crochet trtr triple treble_crochet notes - pattern instructions within brackets all take place in the same stitch
